events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size is incorrect and it doesn't fit me at all.
The system has categorized this issue under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to incorrect size.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request associated with order #482910.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused with the original tags still attached?
The order number is 482910, and yes, the jacket is brand new with all tags intact. I haven’t worn it at all.
Great, thank you for confirming. I have initiated your refund process. You'll receive the money back within 5 to 7 business days after we receive the returned item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today and appreciate your assistance.
Your refund case is now marked as resolved. Please let us know once you have shipped the jacket so we can track its return.
We just wanted to check in and ensure you received your refund for the returned jacket. Please contact us if there are any further issues.
Since we have not received any further messages from you, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for shopping with us.
Please take a moment to complete a brief survey about your refund experience to help us improve our services.
